subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: An N.B.A. algorithm may be able to predict which players as a group are most productive. And that rating system favors the Pistons and the Cavaliers over the Spurs in the finals.
snippet: An N.B.A. algorithm may be able to predict which players as a group are most productive. And that rating system favors the Pistons and the Cavaliers over the Spurs in the finals.
